GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles sorted by date in descending order

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object containing a single article corresponding to the provided article id

article.author: butter_bridge
article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for a given article_id with the most recent comments first

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a comment for a specific article and serves an object representing the posted comment

exampleResponse.body: The owls are not what they seem.
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the number of votes for a specific article and serves an object representing the updated article

exampleResponse.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
exampleResponse.author: icellusedkars
